info.author: Stephen Oliver
info.description:
NetRNG allows a dedicated machine with a hardware based random number generator
to provide random data to other machines on the network that don't have an RNG of
their own, similar to entropy broker. It allows those machines to benefit from a
high speed, (hopefully) high quality entropy source.

info.name: NetRNG
info.summary: Random data distribution over local network
info.html_description: NetRNG allows a dedicated machine with a hardware based random number generator to provide random data to other machines on the network that don’t have an RNG of their own, similar to entropy broker. It allows those machines to benefit from a high speed, (hopefully) high quality entropy source.
